Posts.Content: smoking is bad for everyone, its a public health disaster. Grandkids? come on.....
Posts.Title: opinion needed

Posts.Content: Hi all. My surgeon was doctor Holden at cedars in Los Angeles .Considered world wide as the best surgeon in this field.he was so busy he never sat during my appointments. Later I learned his nickname is skippy given to him by his colleagues because he skips so fast between clients. He gave me a prescription and before I filled my son looked in up I the web and found it was contraindicated with a med I was already taken. Holden flipped out and yelled " you're not a doctor, I'm the expert do what I say. I left and thought to myself, to be an expert you need to know the causes and cures for the cancer , there are no experts in the field of prostate cancer. Furthermore as a surgeon, he along with all other surgeons have no business practicing oncology, which is a completely different specialty.I found dr. Hoffman in Beverly hills, my first appointment lasted 1hour and we sat the entire time there were no interruptions . All subsequent visit lasted 1/2 hour. We go on the computer to look up the latest on prostate cancer and he takes all the time I need to understand what's going on.i've never been late for an appointment and neither has he! He doesn't overbook .and after a fee visits he gave me his private number, the same one his wife uses! I never have to worry about test results because his nurse practitioner e mails them, or if it's important he calls me at home. Sometimes out of desperation we put up with a lot of crap from our doctors that we wouldn't take from anyone else ( except our kids ).the quality of life improved considerably when I changed doctors. Doctor Hoffman refer me to a real pain management doctor and it's been great.ihope this is helpful. god Bless....Gimmy T
Posts.Title: Quality of service/care at major centers

Posts.Content: Hi all, I'm going to be 65 on march 17th or at least that my goal. Stage 4 metastasisized .....had prostate removed march 2003...radiation 2008...2010.....have traveled looking for help but all roads eventually lead back to Los angels. I've tried everything and I mean everything to no avail. Now it's about comfort and pain management . I also have fibromyalgia ,as a result of the radiation ( according to my doctor). I'm on the 20 butrans patch,60 cymbalta, 50 bicalutamide. Lately my hands have become like ice cubes. I can't use heat pads etc. due to the butrans. Please, if anyone has any ideas respond, I'm so desperate I'll try anything.I'm raising 2of my grand kids ages 20 months and 4 years so I want very much to be in their life's as much as possibly.Thank you, and God bless you all.....Gimmy
Posts.Title: I'm freezing and don't know why

Posts.Content: Hi all, thanks for your support and advice. God bless all....Gimmy
Posts.Title: I'm freezing and don't know why

Posts.Content: Hi all, thanks for your support and advice. God bless all....Gimmy
Posts.Title: I'm freezing and don't know why

Posts.Content: Hi all, my cold hands and feet is caused by the immune systems attempt to provide nutrition for essential body organs. The feet and hands are the first to go. The doctor said its the first step in dying. The last to go will be my hearing. What a pissa. I just don' want to go. I cried this afternoon , I was alone and it lasted only a few seconds, I was thinking about my two grand kids that live with me. Whose going to take care of them the boy is four and my princess is 20 months. My worst night ever! The good news, the pain is coming to a end. I just found you guys about a month ago and it's been great. Thanks for your advice and kindness. God Bless All.........Gimmy
Posts.Title: I'm freezing and don't know why

Posts.Content: Hi Sarg, wow, I know i should but I feel it's like giving up, it's been 10 narly years and I'm only 64. I have 4 grandkids 2 of which live with me one ( here i go again just like a broken record ) I just don't want to go. Knowing I'm going is just one more layer of b.s. .. i'm going crazy trying to get everything in order but it seems like it's all slipping through my fingers. in the next week or so i have to get married and adopt my son to make everything legal...i've changed my will twice in the last 2 days and changed the executor once. I'm making so many mistakes and I'm afraid I'll screw it up ,I don't no what i'm doing......I'm just so DESPERATE, ....Oh my God getting hit by a bus would've been so much more humane....but knowing pretty much about when I'm going to leave is scary....I keep thinking they'll find a cure in the next few days, fat chance thats going to happen.....I USED TO BE SOMEBODY, now look at me I've become a babbling COWARD. Your right I should call the hospice, and I will right after the civil ceremony. Thanks for saying what every one else was afraid to say. Thanks for letting me vent..Good luck to you Sarg and God Bless You All........Gimmy......my real name is Eugene

Please some one try it you have nothing to loose .It works for I pray it works for you............Gimmy

Posts.Content: Hi Ron , I had one in for 4 weeks and ended up with a horrible infection. A little drip ,i had that it fixed itself and wasn't that bad..God Bless......gimmy

Posts.Title: Foley catheter still in, 4 weeks tomorrow, anyone else had it this long?

Posts.Content: Listen up all, my # 2 son took me to hyper-baric oxygen therapy on Monday 1 hr. treatment felt great after woods . Last night I slept 100% pain free for the first time in years. I'm 64 stage 4 prostate cancer matastisized preparing for my transition. I also suffer from fibro so the combined pain has been hell. Very little pain today. I'm going to my next hyber baric oxygen treatment at 1:15 I will report back at about 3:30 Los Angeles time. 1 hr treatment and reasonably priced. God Bless....gimmy
Posts.Title: Pain 100%. Free

Posts.Content: Dear helpmyhusband, the ist month is free thats right free so get your husband on it now and see what developes. I'v been on it for 3 week and i feel sooooo much better. keep in touch.....gimmy

Stay on this site for the real 411..........Gimmy

Posts.Title: Never again!

Posts.Content: Hi derkie, i'am stage 4, I did the gold standard followed by radiation twice and ended up with fibromyalgia . The radiation kills bad cells and good cells and damages the nerves. In hindsight I wish I had skipped the radiation and just stayed with the hormone therapy. The radiation didn't work! Ask you.doctor what the odds are the radiation will be completely successful . my life is nearly a complete wreck. The fibro is way worse pain than the cancer. Do yourself a favor and get a second opinion and all the 411 out there or here on radiation therapy . God Bless....Gimmy
Posts.Title: Staging Results And A Few More Questions

Posts.Content: Hi Bob, How old are you? What were your complaints ? If none as i suspect it looks to me like your New York doctor was mining and he struck gold...I really don't think you needed any of those tests. Cleveland sounds about right to me ...My advise keep checking out this web site before you do anything more. This is the best source for info..Lets see what everyone else thinks......Gimmy..stage 4 mets zytiga
Posts.Title: What to Do about Conflicting Advice

Posts.Content: Hi Tom, Your psa levels are normal for your age. Why a biopsy ? Are you in pain ? If not no more free test that will ended up costing a bunch and could ruin your life. Please read richard albin new york op-ed march 9, 2010...Gimmy 65 stage 4 mets
Posts.Title: Digital Rectal Exam Question

Posts.Content: Hi Mickee, There is a chemical you can inject into your penis and you will get rigid. I've done it many times once you get over sticking your penis with a needle it's a piece of cake. Your doctor should have provided that option to you. I'm chemically castrated because the cancer came back after 5years it's called recurrence . It's impossible to create in you head a sexual thought, nothing is a turn on. It is a cruel and horrible way to exist. It's used on convicted sex offenders. Being Italian sex was always big on things to do. I weighed in at 136 lbs, now I'm at 206 down from 217. my breasts are huge ,we literally turn into women. Recurrence happens in a very small percent of us so your probably going to be just fine. Between the recurrence and the castration I had 1 to 2 hookers a day, home just couldn't do the job. You need someone who doesn't know the score and someone who will focus on your pleasure. It will restore your confidence and you'll be the man you were before . It sounds like you and your old lady are not only not on the same page but your not even reading the same book. Can you imagine how she'd treat you if you really got sick!!!! For $10 a hour you can have the cleanest house in town, there are plenty of good restaurants and for a few bucks you can have your pipes cleaned by a different pro every day..I sure miss those days. Maybe just maybe a lifestyle change would lower your stress level and raise your self confidence through the roof. I've been through the whole prostate cancer nightmare so if you ever want to talk just text me. Good luck. ...Gimmy
Posts.Title: castration

Posts.Content: Ok Mickee, Castration is absolutely the last option you want to consider and only when faceing certainty of death. Calm down and memorize ChemoMans 3 things to remember. Don't panic,never give up and #3 don't forget the first 2. We have all walked in your shoes. Millions of men who have had their prostates removed live long and happy lives and enjoy sex. A very small percent of us will ever have a recurrence ,and that is usually 5 years after the operation. The environment your living in may significantly impact your ability to perform sexually. There are trained perfessionals who can be used to help invigorate you sex life. As highlander said use it or loose it. Go on line and manipulate yourself every day watching porno.You have to start talking to your penis just like you did when the catheter was removed. It works. You are fine give yourself a break and give it time. You have nothing to be humiliated for , you had a medical procedure just like a heart attack you need patient loving care. Are you getting that at home? Have you checked to see if there are support groups in your town? Please continue to come on line everyone here really cares and prays for you!!! Remember 1,2,3 ...Gimmy ...........By the way I'm 64 prostate removed 2003, recurrence 2008, chemo,radiation 2008,castrated, radiation 2011 matastisized ,currently going through round of radiation and experimently drugs. And hyper baric oxygen therapy ( it helps to make me more comfortable. 1,2,3

Posts.Title: Radiation vs robotic prostatectomy, what should I do?

Posts.Content: Hi guys , doctor wants me on zytiga 250mg starting Monday .should I do it ? My son is going nuts over this up to now he's made all the right calls .but this zytiga seems to only be used for extending life for 2-5 months or there abouts. so he thinks if he says no he'll be killing me early and if he says yes then he's afraid I'll suffer more. There's too much going on for me to think straight........anyone else using it....Thanks Eugene
Posts.Title: Sarg, chuck, advice anyone

Posts.Content: Hi Mariod, Yes your overreacting but thats normal.Please please listen to what fairwind said he's 100% right. psa 10 is just fine for your age and if you checked it every month you'll see that psa fluctuates all over the place. were you in pain? why did you have a biopsy ? Read richard albin op-ed for new york times march 9 2010.albin invented the psa test. ever man has some cancer but its not going to kill them .your in great shape stay that way .doctors don't know what causes prostate cancer and they don't know how to cure it.so if your not in pain you really have no reason to see a doctor again. I'm 64 stage 4 metastasis on zytiga. please keep coming to this site and do your own research.....gimmy

Posts.Title: diagnosed today feb 22nd 2013

Posts.Content: Mickee, I'm going through exactly what your going through except my partner doesn't define our relationship in the same way your partner does. I'm castrated because I needed to attempt to slow the cancer growth. Take it from me and do some research . You will be miserable your life will suck. Remember you will be turned for all intensive purposes into a ugly fat tired women. Did you know that. You will think like a women and have mood swing like a women and you will look like a women, is that what your wife wants a fat ugly sister.i gained 87 lbs my breast are in unbelievable pain all the time, just putting on my t. Shirt kills me . My breast are bigger than anyone I ever dated. If your wife has no interest in you now in private can you imagine how she'll treat you in public when you look more like a women than a man. Have you ever seen a drag queen well that how you'r
Posts.Title: coping with celibacy

Posts.Content: Hi Billc, Who says you have prostate cancer? there is no test to determine cancer in the prostate. please read Richard Albins new york times op ed march 9 2010 Albins invented the psa and has denouced the use of it for 3 years stating that the test is money driven and a national health crises . doctors make so much money that the cant stop using it. why are you in such a rush to do something when you dont have to. there are no experts in the field of prostate cancer they dont know what causes it or how to fix it ...wait and research this site and articles from both sides of the debate before you risk giving up your life as you now know it. does never ever having an erection or sex again sound appealing? does the adult diaper sound kool? you can forget playing with your grandchildren or enjoying anything outside the home. the upside is you might get to pick your own coffin, i did! Yes I am ragging bloody mad. I got diagnosed in 2003 surgery 2003 Fast forward to Hell, I have just started Zyntiga the newest miracle drug. it might give me a little time its $5685.00 per bottle 15 day supply ( out rage ). I am stage 4 metastic, pain off the charts maybe 2 hours of sleep in the last 7 days due to predisone. Quality of life next to O. My goal is too make it to my 65th birthday which is 3/17.Bill wait and see .if your not in pain you are ok. the cure is coming.Gimmy

Posts.Content: Hi all, sequoiaranger would you consider friending me so we can talk or text? I'm 64, prostate removed in 2003, recurrent 2008. The thread just before yours is mine and it goes into more detail. Had bone scan 2 days ago. Mets every where spine arms legs just every where. In the X-ray I looked like a lit Xmas tree. I'm on 20 butrans,and cymbalta for pain I'm barely functional. The pain is super bad. I also have fibromyalgia . My doctors going to put me on zytiga. Like you I'll do anything to keep going .i have 2 of my grand kids living with me and they are my great inspiration. Thank you and god bless all .....Gimmy
Posts.Title: Xtandi, and Samarium 153

Posts.Content: hi blue, a fellow Rhode Islander born at saint josephs 1948. read walshe's book. don't rush into anything. research the doctors , how many procedures have they performed? are you in pain ? it took 12 years to go from detection to terminal stage 4 hospice and then the miracle, zytiga put the cancer into remission. my point is new drugs are coming out all the time so don't rush you may not ever need to operate. you are welcome to contact me anytime...gimmy
Posts.Title: treatment in rhode island

Posts.Title: treatment in rhode island

Posts.Content: hi forty,everyone has cancer in their bodies. you can't get rid of all cancer. your really in fairly good shape. new drugs are coming on line all the time, so you may never need to operate. take it slow. the operation can go wrong and then your life changes big time. mine went way bad.......you can contact me anytime....gimmy
Posts.Title: treatment in rhode island

Posts.Content: Hi Bob, Chuck is right so it does help to know your age. For bone pain radiation has worked well for me. I've done it twice for both shoulders and sternum. are you on zytiga? I am and it has made a difference. for overall pain control i am on cymbalta and butrans patch. We real need much more info on your overall medical profile so we can help you......Gimmy.......65 stage 4 bone mets.....
Posts.Title: Prostate removal question.

Posts.Content: Retired guy, in a march 11, 2010 op- ed piece in the new York times written by ricard ablin the inventor of the psa test , he calls the psa " a profit driven public health disaster" and recommends not doing psa test because it cannot detect prostate cancer,etc.....the American medical association recommended no more testing on may 25, 2012.... The AAFP and the uspstf also recommended not doing psa test on may 22, 2012.... Hope this info helps you. Having already been through all this ,I wish i'd never heard of the psa test......I hope you stop taking the test, don' t even think about it you'll almost for sure going to die of something else many years down the road...enjoy your retirement .... God Bless...Gimmy

Posts.Title: coping with celibacy

Posts.Content: Going to look . You say your impotent, your not. Your wife makes you feel humiliated and embarrassed? Good god man you have cancer ,not your fault just the way it is. You need to get to a therapist fast. Would you castrate yourself if you had stroke, or a heart attack .Ask your wife if she wants to be seen in public with a ugly drag queen. It sounds to me your looking for someone to agree with you, this site is full of fighters. I'll bet no man on this site has ever had to deal with a wife like yours. You have prostate cancer big deal it could be a whole lot worse.I will pray that there is no surgeon that would castrate you for absolutely no medical reason. Something is way wrong with this whole picture. A otherwise healthy man wants to castrate himself because his wife is not sexually interested in him and she makes him feel embaressed and humiliated , is that called love ( in sickness and in health) think about if she doesn't want you now she sure is hell ain't going to want a girlfriend and when you get a divorce who then will want you. You don't want us to tell you keep fighting but that's what we do we are here to help preserve the quality of life not to mutilate and destroy life. You state " you want a castration " well I wanted to blow my brains out but nobody thought that was a good idea. You can be happy . And what's the big rush anyway? It takes time to heal give it time. You sir have no idea of the horror your wishing for!....... Gimmy .........upside you will not have to shave ever again whoopee ....

God Bless You Both, and God Save the Queen.....Gimmy

You need to get to a therapist fast. Would you castrate yourself if you had stroke, or a heart attack .Ask your wife if she wants to be seen in public with a ugly drag queen. It sounds to me your looking for someone to agree with you, this site is full of fighters. I'll bet no man on this site has ever had to deal with a wife like yours. You have prostate cancer big deal it could be a whole lot worse.I will pray that there is no surgeon that would castrate you for absolutely no medical reason. Something is way wrong with this whole picture. A otherwise healthy man wants to castrate himself because his wife is not sexually interested in him and she makes him feel embaressed and humiliated , is that called love ( in sickness and in health) think about if she doesn't want you now she sure is hell ain't going to want a girlfriend and when you get a divorce who then will want you. You don't want us to tell you keep fighting but that's what we do we are here to help preserve the quality of life not to mutilate and destroy life. You state " you want a castration " well I wanted to blow my brains out but nobody thought that was a good idea. You can be happy . And what's the big rush anyway? It takes time to heal give it time. You sir have no idea of the horror your wishing for!....... Gimmy .........upside you will not have to shave ever again whoopee ....
Posts.Title: coping with celibacy

Posts.Content: Hi rich s. you're the first guy I've heard from who is stage 4 can I please talk with you by text or phone? I've only been on this site for a week and I don't know how it works. God Bless All, Gimmy Ps thank everyone for your suggestions and kind thoughts.
Posts.Title: Am I dying?

Posts.Content: Hi Billc, Who says you have prostate cancer? there is no test to determine cancer in the prostate. please read Richard Albins new york times op ed march 9 2010 Albins invented the psa and has denouced the use of it for 3 years stating that the test is money driven and a national health crises . doctors make so much money that the cant stop using it. why are you in such a rush to do something when you dont have to. there are no experts in the field of prostate cancer they dont know what causes it or how to fix it ...wait and research this site and articles from both sides of the debate before you risk giving up your life as you now know it. does never ever having an erection or sex again sound appealing? does the adult diaper sound kool? you can forget playing with your grandchildren or enjoying anything outside the home. the upside is you might get to pick your own coffin, i did! Yes I am ragging bloody mad. I got diagnosed in 2003 surgery 2003 Fast forward to Hell, I have just started Zyntiga the newest miracle drug. it might give me a little time its $5685.00 per bottle 15 day supply ( out rage ). I am stage 4 metastic, pain off the charts maybe 2 hours of sleep in the last 7 days due to predisone. Quality of life next to O. My goal is too make it to my 65th birthday which is 3/17.Bill wait and see .if your not in pain you are ok. the cure is coming.Gimmy

Posts.Title: billc

Posts.Content: Dear Kazzie, Your husband is indeed lucky to have such a wonderful wife. We all agree there is no reason to panic. Coming onto this site is the best thing you could've done, you'll always get the best available information ...We are here to help everyone including our friends across the pond... God Bless You Both, and God Save the Queen.....Gimmy
Posts.Title: Husband just diagnosed-I'm terrified. Please advise if you can

Posts.Content: hi forty,everyone has cancer in their bodies. you can't get rid of all cancer. your really in fairly good shape. new drugs are coming on line all the time, so you may never need to operate. take it slow. the operation can go wrong and then your life changes big time. mine went way bad.......you can contact me anytime....gimmy
Posts.Title: treatment in rhode island

Posts.Content: zytiga $5685 one month supply thats just wrong, but it is working for me, still...gimmy
Posts.Title: Why Does It Cost So Much??

Posts.Content: zytiga $5685 one month supply thats just wrong, but it is working for me, still...gimmy
Posts.Title: Why Does It Cost So Much??

Posts.Content: Hi, today is my first day on z so I don't know outcome. But I have mets every where and they hope to give me a extra few months but the pain is out of control. My point being how bad off is your dad? I think we all need more history in order to provide some information. If dad is stage 4 with no other options that's one thing but if there's any other treatments and he has time, then the cost will drop and we can all afford it. More info would real help....Gimmy
Posts.Title: Zytiga question

Posts.Content: Hi Scorpionking, I've been on zytiga and prednisone and it working. i feel euphoric most of the time no pain no side effects energy level was low when i first started and still is. your first bottle is free so get that now then figure out what to do later........good luck ........gimmy
Posts.Title: Zytiga question
